chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
m: X -> X -> X
u: X
Hmonoid: monoid_theory m u
n: nat
y: X
x: X

Goal:
x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x -> mscal n (x ⊕ y) = mscal n x ⊕ mscal n y

Premises:
mscal = fun (n : nat) (x : X) => ∑ n (fun _ : nat => x) : nat -> X -> X Arguments mscal _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
monoid_theory : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> Prop
mscal_comm : forall (n : nat) (x y : X), x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x -> mscal n x ⊕ y = y ⊕ mscal n x
mscal_S : forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal (S n) x = x ⊕ mscal n x
mscal_plus1 : forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal (S n) x = mscal n x ⊕ x
mscal_plus : forall (a b : nat) (x : X), mscal (a + b) x = mscal a x ⊕ mscal b x
monoid_assoc : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : Fin.t n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat]
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
monoid_unit_r : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m x u = x
monoid_unit_l : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x
Nat.div_mod : forall x y : nat, y <> 0 -> x = y * (x / y) + x mod y
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n0 v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n0 v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X ->...-> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
msum_comm : forall (a : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ⊕ a = a ⊕ f i) -> ∑ n f ⊕ a = a ⊕ ∑ n f
msum = fix msum (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) {struct n} : X := match n with | 0 => u | S n0 => f 0 ⊕ msum n0 (fun n1 : nat => f (S n1)) end : nat -> (nat -> X) -> X Arguments msum _%nat_scope _%function_scope
mscal_1 : forall x : X, mscal 1 x = x
msum_sum : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f j ⊕ g i = g i ⊕ f j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⊕ g i) = ∑ n f ⊕ ∑ n g
mscal_0 : forall x : X, mscal 0 x = u
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Eqdep_dec.UIP_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x y : A) (p1 p2 : x = y), p1 = p2
Z.lt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
msum_plus1 : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (S n) f = ∑ n f ⊕ f n
msum_first_two : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), 2 <= n -> (forall i : nat, 2 <= i -> f i = u) -> ∑ n f = f 0 ⊕ f 1
msum_msum : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> X), (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, i1 < n -> j1 < k -> i2 < n -> j2 < k -> f i1 j1 ⊕ f i2 j2 = f i2 j2 ⊕ f i1 j1) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ k (f i)) = ∑ k (fun j : nat => ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i j))
Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := Nat.divmod x y q u in x + S y * q + (y - u) = S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
msum_ends : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= n -> f i = u) -> ∑ (n + 2) f = f 0 ⊕ f (S n)
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Arguments Zeq_bool (_ _)%Z_scope
UIP_nat : forall (x y : nat) (p1 p2 : x = y), p1 = p2
msum_S : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (S n) f = f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0))
mscal_of_unit : forall n : nat, mscal n u = u
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
msum_plus : forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (a + b) f = ∑ a f ⊕ ∑ b (fun i : nat => f (a + i))
gcd.own_multiple : forall x p : nat, x = p * x -> x = 0 \/ p = 1
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
Eqdep_dec.UIP_refl_nat : forall (n : nat) (x : n = n), x = eq_refl
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Init.Nat.add x 1 : positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never

``` 
unfold mscal.
intros H.
rewrite H.
repeat rewrite mscal_S.
rewrite <- msum_sum.
apply msum_comm.
intro i.
intro Hi.
apply mscal_comm.
exact H.
```

original: unfold mscal. intros H. rewrite H. repeat rewrite mscal_S. rewrite <- msum_sum. apply msum_comm. intro i. intro Hi. apply mscal_comm. apply H.
